name: Appleseed-search-arturs.io
body:
## Welcome to the Appleseed Framework - Search Technologies Page
The Appleseed Framework is maintained and managed primarily by [Anant Corporation](www.anant.us). It is composed of Appleseed Base, Appleseed Search, and [Appleseed Portal](https://github.com/Appleseed/portal).

## Search Technologies
Here we will cover the various underlying technologies that Appleseed Search is made up of, and provide some resources regarding these technologies. 

### Apache Lucene
1. [An Introduction to Lucene](http://lucene.apache.org/core/)
2. Watch this[14-minute Introductory Video] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vLEvmZ5eEz0)
3. An article about the various [good parts of Lucene](http://blog.parsely.com/post/1691/lucene/)
  1. The [Hacker News discussion thread](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=9198092) on the above article. 

### Apache Solr

### Elastic Search

### Support or Contact
If you have any questions please don't hesitate to reach out to us [via our contact page](www.anant.us/contact.aspx) or leave us a message in our [gitter chat room](https://gitter.im/Appleseed)!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
